Package com.example.escriturarapidajuego.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.example.escriturarapidajuego.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
Main game class that manages the game state, player, and game flow. Handles level progression, timing, user input validation, and game session management. Serves as the central coordinator between all game components.
Version:
1.0
Author:
David

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(javafx.scene.control.Label timerLabel, GameController gameController)
      Constructs a new Game with a timer display label and game controller reference. Allows the timer to communicate with the game controller for time expiration events.
      Parameters:
      timerLabel - the label to display timer information
      gameController - the game controller for timer callbacks

  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      public boolean playTurn(String userAnswer)
      Processes a player's turn with their answer submission. Validates the answer, updates game state, and handles level progression.
      Parameters:
      userAnswer - the player's input to validate
      Returns:
      true if the answer was correct, false otherwise

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over. Game ends when either no more words are available or time has expired.
      Returns:
      true if game is over, false otherwise

    • showResults

      public void showResults()
      Displays the game results and stops the timer. Outputs final statistics to the console.

    • getCurrentWord

      public String getCurrentWord()
      Gets the current word/phrase to be typed.
      Returns:
      the current word/phrase

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Gets the player object with current statistics.
      Returns:
      the player instance

    • getCurrentLevel

      public int getCurrentLevel()
      Gets the current level number.
      Returns:
      the current level number

    • getTimer

      public GameTimer getTimer()
      Gets the game timer instance.
      Returns:
      the game timer

    • getRules

      public GameRules getRules()
      Gets the game rules instance.
      Returns:
      the game rules
